DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether p53 vaccination follow high dose chemotherapy autologous HCT T cell therapy significantly induce immune response result 1-year survival great current 70 % .
DOC.brief_title: Autologous SCT Followed Dendritic Cell p53 Vaccination Patients With Limited Stage Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm SCLC present Limited Stage ( LS ) diagnosis . Measurable disease time initial therapy Appropriate treatment LSSCLC include radiotherapy chemotherapy . Responsive disease standard chemoradiation therapy define RECIST Patients CR chemoradiation therapy strongly recommend treat prophylactic cranial irradiation CBC absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) > /= 1,000/uL , hemoglobin > /= 8.0 g/DL platelet count > /= 75,000/uL . Normal prothrombin time ( PT ) partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) , unless monitor anticoagulation therapy medical condition exclude trial . Liver enzymes : total bilirubin less equal 2mg/dL ; AST ALT le 1.5X upper limit normal . Creatinine clearance > /= 60 mL/min Pulmonary : DLCO great 50 % Cardiac : leave ventricular ejection fraction great 45 % Patient stable ( SD ) progressive disease ( PD ) 4 cycle standard cisplatin etoposide concurrent chest irradiation Pregnant lactate woman HIV infection confirm NAT Common variable immunodeficiency Active CNS malignancy Active bacterial , fungal viral infection Unfavorable psychosocial evaluation history poor compliance prescribe medical care Prior history autologous allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation Presence protocol specific comorbid condition
DOC.keyword: Limited Stage Small Cell Lung Cancer
